subject: Missing parts in order
description_text:
I ordered the PRO XUltra sim racing pedals and only recieved the base
plate. I would like insight as to how this will be handled. The order was
placed on November 28th,2025 through amazon and the order number is
#113-2127880-3135400. At to have paid this much for a product I would like
to have recieved the whole product.

Looking forward to a resolution to this issue
Thank you - Kyle Suggs

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Suggs,  We have reshipped a new package to you.Â   The tracking number for the PRO X Ultra Pedals is 886909778289 (ships from US warehouse, the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack )
